rooms.name: Wastedump
rooms.description:
This room is filled with bone shards and fragments.  Something (or things)
very big lives here.  A small plaque is on the wall.

south.description: You find the stench is stronger inside.

extra_descriptions.description:
This zone (trollden) is created by MERC for any MERC Mud.
copyright 1992

rooms.name: Troll's Larder
rooms.description:
This room has blood and grime all over the walls.  You see maggots and other
insects crawling up them.  The resident is definitely uncivilized.  Half-eaten
and rotting body parts scatter the floor, each having its own colony of flies,
worms, and maggots.

east.description:
You welcome the fresh breeze coming from the east, but wrinkle your nose when
the stench bears down on you once more.

extra_descriptions.description: YUCK!  You find worms crawling in and out this poor unfortunate former human.

rooms.name: Troll's Living Room
rooms.description:
This small cave opens to the north, south, east, and west.  You are
overcome by the stench and consider turning around.

north.description: There is a trail of bone shards and fragments leading north.

east.description:
Good God!  You spy corpses all over the floor in there.  It looks like a
virtual graveyard in there.

south.description:
Whoa!  You reel back from the stench.  You believe you have found the source
of this bad smell.

west.description:
You puke as you watch worms crawl between this room and the room west of here
as they bore new holes into a corpse laying on the far wall of the west room.

rooms.name: The Playpen
rooms.description:
The walls are covered with blood (and body parts!?!?).  Plastered on the far
wall you see what looks like a human arm.  A half-eaten body lies here with
its chest ripped out.  The predator seems disinterested in it.

west.description:
You welcome the fresh breeze coming from the west, but wrinkle your nose when
the stench bears down on you once more.

extra_descriptions.description:
This reminds you of what a baby would do to its formula during dinnertime,
plastering it on the wall.

rooms.name: Troll's Bedroom
rooms.description:
Obviously something REALLY big lives here.  The stench is quite unbearable.
There are piles and piles of rotten and half-eaten body parts of animals,
orcs, (and humans?) strewn across the floor.  There is a larger, more
prominent pile of rotten parts over in a corner.  It seems to have been
flattened by something.

north.description:
You welcome the fresh breeze coming from the north, but wrinkle your nose when
the stench bears down on you once more.

mobiles.name: the guardian beast
mobiles.description: A guardian beast stares at you and snarls in rage.

mobiles.name: the young troll
mobiles.description: A young troll is sitting down, chewing on a bone.

mobiles.name: the medium troll
mobiles.description: A troll is grooming his pet, a guardian beast.

mobiles.name: a baby troll
mobiles.description: A baby troll is playing Doctor with a cadaver.

mobiles.name: the giant troll
mobiles.description: A giant troll is lying on a pile of carnage, pleasing his mistress.

mobiles.name: the large female troll
mobiles.description: A large female troll is lying on the pile of carnage, blissfully writhing.

mobiles.name: a fat worm
mobiles.description: A fat worm scurries around, looking for food.

mobiles.name: the roving beast
mobiles.description: A roving beast is searching for prey.

mobiles.name: the medium troll
mobiles.description: A troll is wandering around, attending to his duties.

objects.name: the cadaver-toy
objects.description: A half eaten corpse is laying here

objects.name: the heap of carnage
objects.description: There is a bed made of carnage here.

objects.name: the troll skin
objects.description: The filthy hide of a beast is laying here.

objects.name: an opal ring
objects.description: A ring of black opal lies here gathering dust.

objects.name: a leather belt
objects.description: An old leather belt is left on the floor.

objects.name: a cracked bone
objects.description: A cracked piece of bone lies here.
